CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 18, 1961, pg. 6, reads: "More Praise from Merchants - As an aftermath to being given at 'distinguished service award' by Citizens Law Enforcement Assistance Network (CLEAN) at the Hotel Penn-Sheraton last Sunday. Patrolman Oliver Mason, center, has gifts and praise bestowed on him at the Hill Pharmacy, Centre Ave. and Green St., the following day by Leon Edelson and Will Darling, owners of the Centre Ave. business. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Leon Edelson and Will Darling presenting gift to Police Officer Oliver Mason in Hill Pharmacy with display of Valentine's Day candy boxes, Centre Avenue and Green Street, Hill District
